desc: 味方単体の、敵から受けたステータスダウン効果を治療する

dictionary.lore: Liquid medicine that can be synthesized by using Tonics and Blue Drops. As a nourishing concoction, it has the ability to relax both the mind and the body, eliminating any diminution of Atk, Def, or Rec statuses. It is said that the Remedy was first created by a rookie Summoner who mistook the number of Blue Drops required to synthesize a Tonic.

name: 快気薬
